Shade-slayer cloaks were a variety of enchanted roguess cloak that made their sneaky attacks deadly.
When worn, a shade-slayer cloak felt rough and coarse against ones skin, however, the moment the cloak entered shadows, it softened to the texture of the finest silks.
The cloaks wearer could dispense especially deadly and well-aimed attacks from the shadows with a greater ease, making even the worst assassins into the deadliest opponents.
